titleInfo.title: The Business and Professional Women's Hour, Talk Number Three, The Underlying Philosophy of the NRA

mods.abstract: Talk given by Otho C. Ault, Professor of Rural Economics, George Peabody College for Teachers, in support of the National Recovery Administration.
